channel.title: Laravel Eloquent Relationship on Laravel SPA
channel.description: Recent content in Laravel Eloquent Relationship on Laravel SPA

item.title: How to create a One-To-Many relationship in Laravel?
item.description: After we learned about the types of relationships within Laravel in the previous part. We discussed the first type of these relationships, which is the One-To-One relationship. Today we continue the series we started learning about Laravel Eloquent Relationships.
